com.lonepulse.robozombie.request
Interface Interceptor

public interface Interceptor

This contract defines the policy for intercepting a request and processing it just before it's submitted for execution.


Usage:

  1. At type-level on an endpoint; attaches the interceptor(s) for all requests.

    @Endpoint("https://api.github.com")
@Intercept({CommonInterceptor1.class, CommonInterceptor2.class})
    public interface GitHubEndpoint {
     ...
    }

  2. At method-level on a request.

    @Deserialize(JSON)
@GET("/users/{user}/gists")
@Intercept(SpecificInterceptor.class)
List<Gist> getGists(@PathParam("user") String user);

  3. As a request parameter.

    @Deserialize(JSON)  @GET("/users/{user}/gists")
List<Gist> getGists(@PathParam("user") String user, Interceptor interceptor);


Since:
1.3.0

Version:
1.1.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe

Method Summary
 void intercept(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request)
          Accepts the HttpRequestBase which was intercepted just before execution and supplies the InvocationContext to discover additional information about the invocation.
 

Method Detail

intercept

void intercept(InvocationContext context,
               org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request)

Accepts the HttpRequestBase which was intercepted just before execution and supplies the InvocationContext to discover additional information about the invocation.

Parameters:
context - the InvocationContext which provides information about the proxy invocation

request - the HttpRequestBase which was intercepted just before execution

Since:
1.3.0
